Testing VPMAXSD instruction
==========================
Test 1: 128-bit basic functionality
Operand A: 2147483647 -2147483648 1000000000 -1000000000 
Operand B: -2147483648 2147483647 -500000000 500000000 
Result: 2147483647 2147483647 1000000000 500000000 
Expected: 2147483647 2147483647 1000000000 500000000 
[PASS]

Test 2: 128-bit memory operand
Operand A (register): 500000000 -600000000 700000000 -800000000 
Operand B (memory): -400000000 650000000 -750000000 900000000 
Result: 500000000 650000000 700000000 900000000 
Expected: 500000000 650000000 700000000 900000000 
[PASS]

Test 3: 256-bit AVX operation
Operand A: -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 
Operand B: 2147483647 -2147483648 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 
Result: 2147483647 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 2147483647 2147483647 
Expected: 2147483647 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 -2147483648 2147483647 2147483647 2147483647 
[PASS]

VPMAXSD tests PASSED
